alert.note: Alert for Allendale (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 30 at 8:23PM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast South Carolina, including the following county, Allendale. * WHEN...Until 945 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 821 PM EDT, Doppler radar light to moderate rainfall moving across Allendale County as Tropical Storm Idalia moves across south coastal South Carolina. While additional flooding is unlikely, it will take a bit longer for any flood waters to diminish. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Allendale, Sycamore, Ulmer, Appleton, Seigling, Martin, Millett, Baldock, Allendale County Airport, Milbury, Averill and Jennys.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
